Mercy Amba Oduyoye (amuru n'afọ 1934) bụ Ghanaian Methodist theologian a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na nka mmụta okpukpe nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa.  Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi nke  Institute of African Women in Religion and Culture na Trinity Theological Seminary na Ghana.
A mụrụ Oduyoye na Ghana n'afọ 1934
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na University of Ghana n'afọ 1963, nwetakwa akara ugo mmụta nke abụọ na Cambridge University n'afọ 1965, na ugo mmụta ogo na Cambridge n'afọ 1969
Site n'afọ 1967 rue 1979, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ mmụta ndị ntorobịa nke World Council of Churches ; site n’afọ 1987 rue 1994, ọ bụ onye osote onye ode akwụkwọ n’otu nzukọ ahụ
Ọ kuziri nkuzi na Harvard University, Union Theological Seminary na University of Ibadan

Ọ rụọla ọrụ dịka onye isi nke World Student Christian Federation ma hiwe Circle of Concerned African Women Theologians n'afọ 1989.Oduyoye edela akwụkwọ anọ na artikulu kariri iri asatọ n'ọnụọgụ nke gbadoro ukwu na nka mmụta okpukpe nke ndị kristị site na echiche nke ndị feminist na Africa
Otu n'ime isi okwu ya bụ ka okpukpere chi na omenaala ndi Africa si emetuta ahụmahụ umu nwanyi Afrika
Karịsịa, o kwuola banyere nsogbu mmegbu akụ na ụba na-ebe ụmụ nwanyị Afrika nọ.
Oduyoye e ritela honorary degrees na University of Amsterdam (1991), Stellenbosch University  , University of the Western Cape n'afọ 2002  na Yale University n'afọ 2008
